name: Inn-Fighting
description:
This is the first day of development for Inn-Fighting. Just uploading to get it playable by others to see if it is worth going further. All card art and UI is art from the Card Art Asset Humble Bundle and the table used for the background is from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/dinner-table-55180...

Please have a look and enjoy!
